alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 10:33AM CST until January 27 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Houston/Galveston TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... West Fork San Jacinto near Porter affecting Montgomery County. For the West Fork San Jacinto River...including Porter, Sendera Ranch Road, Conroe, Humble, Sheldon...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...West Fork San Jacinto near Porter. * WHEN...From this evening to early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 83.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding continues as the turnaround under SH99 at Riley Fuzzel Road begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CST Thursday the stage was 75.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 73.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 82.4 feet late tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 81.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (11 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun West Fork San Jacinto Porter 81.0 75.8 Thu 9 am CST 82.3 80.1 78.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by this evening.late tonight at 445 AM CST.
